message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.GT, cs.MM, cs.RO 

The paper deals with computer vision and graphics, specifically in the area of volumetric (4D) performance capture. The proposed method involves using a single RGBD camera to synthesize free viewpoint renderings, which falls under the category of computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also involves graphics techniques such as rendering and multi-view capture, which could fall under the categories of computer graphics (cs.GR) and geometric topology (cs.GT). Additionally, the paper mentions machine learning techniques, which could fall under the categories of multimedia (cs.MM) and robotics (cs.RO).
